channel.title: Run and Compiler
channel.description:
When I click run it says "The system cannot find the path specified..." Here is my run code atm: [code]@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m-cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Also, when I click compile it also says "The system cannot find the path specified..." Compile code: [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
I do have the java: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/30j7czp.png[/img]
I have followed many compiler and run.bat tutorials. Changed my many codes around, and still the same thing. Maybe I'm just stupid and doing something wrong, so can someone help.
Source is Massacred World [317].
Edit: Oh and the client run works fine. Didn't need to change anything on it. Maybe this can help some of you. Its code is: [code]@echo off start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]

item.title: Run and Compiler
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Now it says:

“Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx1000-cp
Could not create the java virtual machine”

Read full topic

item.title: Run and Compiler
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Evaur:

Change the “C:Program files…/jdk1.6_*” to The jdk that you have in Program Files -> Java -> jdk(Version here)

I did that and the same thing happened.

The Wanderer:

Just do javac for compiling and javaw for running. You don’t need all of that “C:\stuff” In compiler where you see “C:\blah blah” replace it with javac. In the run replace the “C:\ more blah blah” with javaw. Should work.

I did that and some error popped up saying:
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.

Read full topic

item.title: Run and Compiler
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Just do javac for compiling and javaw for running. You don’t need all of that “C:\stuff” In compiler where you see “C:\blah blah” replace it with javac. In the run replace the “C:\ more blah blah” with javaw. Should work.

item.title: Run and Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Evaur Evaur
item.description:
@Evaur wrote:

[quote=“igli, post:1, topic:418132”]When I click run it says “The system cannot find the path specified…”
Here is my run code atm:

@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m-cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Also, when I click compile it also says “The system cannot find the path specified…”
Compile code:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

I do have the java:

I have followed many compiler and run.bat tutorials. Changed my many codes around, and still the same thing. Maybe I’m just stupid and doing something wrong, so can someone help.

Source is Massacred World [317].

Edit: Oh and the client run works fine. Didn’t need to change anything on it. Maybe this can help some of you. Its code is:

@echo off start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/quote]

Change the “C:Program files…/jdk1.6_*” to The jdk that you have in Program Files -> Java -> jdk(Version here)

Read full topic
